title: Postal Service Slips Up With Special-Edition Stamp For Maya Angelou
teaser: The U.S. Postal Service has put the late poet Maya Angelou's face and name, together with a choice quotation, on a special edition stamp. Trouble is, that quotation didn't start with her.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
